com.redhat.rhn.domain.server

Class CrashFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.hibernate.HibernateFactory
      • com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.CrashFactory

  • public class CrashFactory
extends HibernateFactory
    CrashFactory - the singleton class used to fetch and store com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.Crash / CrashFile objects from the database.
